ygData.subject: RE: Pixe Strike to be fixed?  Possible 49th song???
ygData.msgSnippet: And I think this really is the attitude to adopt.  One of the reasons I got so angry with them when Ester said she d look into it is because I allowed myself
ygData.messageBody:
And I think this really is the attitude to adopt. One
of the reasons I got so angry with them when Ester
said she'd look into it is because I allowed myself to
be hopefull. Don't expect them to fix it. I think
Rokenn and I would both bet against it and will be
pleasently surprised if they fix it. But I'm not
holding my breath...

Centiera D'Winter
46th Half-Elf Bard
Bristlebane

>I will believe it when I see it....
>
>Rokenn
